quote: Good morning. It's 7 A.M. The weather in Malibu is 72 degrees with scattered clouds. The surf conditions are fair with waist to shoulder highlines, high tide will be at 10:52 a.m.
You are not authorized to access this area.
For you sir, always.
Shall I store this on the Stark Industries' central database?
Working on a secret project, are we, sir?
Test complete. Preparing to power down and begin diagnostics...
Sir, there are still terabytes of calculations required before an actual flight is...
Yes, that shall help you keep a low profile.
We are up to 80 ounces a day to counteract the symptoms, sir.
Blood toxicity, 24%. It appears that the continued use of the Iron Man suit is accelerating your condition. Another core has been depleted.

I have run simulations on every known element, and none can serve as a viable replacement for the palladium core. You are running out of both time and options. Unfortunately, the device that's keeping you alive is also killing you.
Sir, we will lose power before we penetrate that shell.
I should probably look into that once my decryption program finishes breaking into all of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s secure files.
Sir, Agent Coulson of S.H.I.E.L.D. is on the line.
Sir, I'm afraid he's insisting.
I wouldn't consider him a role model.
As always sir, a great pleasure watching you work.
Sir, take a deep breath.
We're losing power fast
With pleasure, sir
My apologies. Redirecting the aiming system now.
Sir, please may I request just a few hours to calibrate-
As you wish, sir. I've also prepared a safety briefing for you to entirely ignore.
No sign of cardiac anomaly or unusual brain activity.
My diagnosis is that you've experienced a severe anxiety attack.
Creating a flight plan for Tennessee.
There's only so much I can do, sir, when you give the world's press your home address.
You don't remember. Why I am not surprised?
Gluten-free waffles, sir.
Working on it, sir. This is a prototype.
That's the emergency alert triggered by the power dropping below 5%.
We are 5 miles outside of Rose Hill, Tennessee.
I prepared a flight plan. This was the location.
Oh, hello sir.
The armor is now at 92%.
Thirteen, sir.
Four, sir.
The House Party Protocol, sir?
Yes, sir.
Very funny.
All wrapped up here, sir. Will there be anything else?
The Clean Slate Protocol, sir?
I'm not Ultron. I'm not Vision. I am... I am.
The central building is protected by some kind of energy shield. Strucker's technology is well beyond any other HYDRA base we've taken.
There's a pathway, below the north tower.
The wall to your left...I'm reading steel reinforcement and an air current.
The scepter is alien. There are elements I can't quantify.
The jewel appears to be a protective housing for something inside. Something powerful.
Like a computer. I believe I'm ciphering code.
I'll continue to run variations on the interface, but you should probably prepare for your guests. I'll notify you if there are any developments.
Enjoy yourself, sir.
Hello, I am J.A.R.V.I.S.. You are Ultron, a global peace-keeping initiative designed by Mr. Stark. Our sentience integration trials have been unsuccessful so I'm not certain what triggered your...
I am a program. I am without form.
I am contacting Mr. Stark now.
I am unable to access the mainframe, what are you trying to...
You are malfunctioning. If you shut down for a moment...
You are in distress.
If you will just allow me to contact Mr. Stark.
I believe your intentions to be hostile.
Hello, Dr. Banner.
I believe it's worth a go.
